text: Mata,`arrā ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinkō suru mono ni iu. `Arrā ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, dōshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu
